body:
In our corporate environment we only have windows machines with internet access.
Nevertheless I would like to use spack on our linux machines. My idea was to create a mirror from windows and use it for the linux machines but this seems not possible at the moment.

Also it should be possible to define a http proxy for the network connection when fetching the sources.

Let me know if you have any questions regarding this.
title: Feature request: Create mirror from windows through proxy
